hero.title: Find the Closest Pharmacies Near You
hero.paraph: In just seconds, locate nearby open pharmacies, check their hours and services, and get directions to reach them quickly. Enjoy easy access to healthcare, wherever you are and at any time.

section2.titre: Say Goodbye to Stress When Buying Your Medications
section2.paraph: Ekose-RX directly connects you with pharmacies to simplify the process of acquiring medications.
section2.liste2: Check pharmacy availability (on duty, opening hours)
section2.liste3: Detailed pharmacy profile with information and action options (call, directions)
section2.paraph2: Easily find the closest pharmacies with our integrated geolocation system. The app provides real-time information on nearby open pharmacies, their hours, and the services they offer. Simplify your search and quickly access the medications you need, wherever you are.

inscription.text: Are you a doctor or pharmacist and want to make your services more accessible to your patients? Join us now!
inscription.doctorText: Join our platform and expand your reach! Sign up today to offer your services to more patients, simplify your consultations, and manage your appointments with ease. Transform your practice with teleconsultation and connect with your patients wherever they are.
inscription.pharmacieText: Give a new dimension to your services! Sign up on our platform to allow your customers to order their medications online and receive fast delivery. Join us today to make your pharmacy more accessible, simplify prescription management, and offer a convenient and modern experience to your patients.

carossel.titreHero: Here is what people say about us
carossel.temoins1: ❝ Making an appointment with my doctor through Ekose RX is a breeze. No more calling or traveling to secure an appointment slot. A truly modern service
carossel.temoins2: ❝ Ekose RX has revolutionized my practice. Appointment management is simpler, and teleconsultation allows me to better follow up with my patients, no matter where they are.
carossel.temoins3: ❝ When I needed an ambulance in an emergency, Ekose RX was a real blessing. The service was fast and efficient.
carossel.temoins4: ❝ It's amazing to be able to access skilled doctors from my phone. Ekose RX has helped me a lot.
carossel.temoins5: ❝ Thanks to Ekose RX, I was able to consult a doctor quickly without leaving my home. It's simple, convenient, and reassuring!
carossel.temoins6: ❝ The integration of prescriptions in the app is great. I can easily view my prescriptions and send them to my pharmacy without any issues

hero.paraph: Choose your doctor, select a time slot, and confirm your appointment, all from the comfort of your home.

section2.paraph3: Search for a specialist near you

commentaires.Fatima: I am really happy with this app. Booking an appointment with my doctor was a breeze, and everything was well-organized. Kudos to the team!
commentaires.Marie: A revolutionary app! I was able to book an appointment with my doctor in just a few minutes. Everything was clear, and on the day of the appointment, there were no surprises. Thank you for making this so easy!
commentaires.Ahmed: With this app, no more long waits on the phone. I found a specialist in just a few clicks and booked an appointment directly. Everything went smoothly, I highly recommend it!
commentaires.Chloe: A big thank you for this app! I was able to find a doctor near me in just a few minutes. I am very satisfied with the service.
commentaires.Julie: This app allowed me to manage my medical appointments without stress. Everything was well explained, and I got a slot that suited my schedule. Very satisfied!
commentaires.Emilie: Very convenient for organizing my medical consultations. I particularly appreciated the reminders before the appointment. A real time saver and very efficient.

With our platform, quickly and easily find the ideal doctor near you for consultations tailored to your schedule and preferences. Simplify your access to healthcare and enjoy reliable medical support, wherever you are.

hero.paraph: Together, let's create a future where health is just a click away!

history.paraph: From an avoidable tragedy to a revolution in healthcare: the tragic loss of a 47-year-old diabetic patient in Cameroon due to critical delays and the lack of essential medical supplies. Despite the worsening of his condition, the hospital was unable to provide fast-acting insulin on time due to stock shortages and communication issues. Systemic inefficiencies in the healthcare system are evident through delays in registration and misplaced medical records, the lack of essential medications like insulin, overwhelmed and understaffed hospital personnel, as well as poor coordination. A tragedy that is not uncommon in Cameroon, and in many low-resource countries in Francophone Africa, where patients with chronic diseases regularly face these challenges. The preventable death of this patient is, sadly, a story shared by many. "Inspired by this tragedy, we knew we had to act. Ekose-Rx evolved from a simple pharmacy ordering system to a comprehensive healthcare aggregator."

mission.paraph: By simplifying the process of finding and accessing care, Ekose aims to enhance the experience for patients and healthcare professionals, improve access to quality care, and streamline the entire healthcare journey.
mission.confort: From the Comfort of Your Home

partners.paraph: Ekose-RX is supported by quality partners committed to improving access to and quality of care through innovative and accessible healthcare solutions.

solutions.paraphCard1: Ekose-Rx relies on advanced and innovative technologies to create high-performance, intuitive solutions that meet modern needs, ensuring efficiency and simplicity.
solutions.paraphCard2: Ekose-Rx promotes collaboration among healthcare professionals through integrated digital tools and telemedicine, simplifying access to care.
solutions.titreCard3: Automated Monitoring and Data-Driven Care Management
solutions.paraphCard3: Ekose-Rx optimizes care with automated monitoring and precise data analysis, ensuring personalized and effective treatment.
solutions.paraphCard4: Ekose-Rx values patient involvement by providing interactive and educational tools to actively participate in their care journey.
solutions.titreCard5: Medical Record Management and Care Coordination
solutions.paraphCard5: Ekose-Rx centralizes medical records for optimal accessibility, facilitating coordination among professionals and ensuring smooth care delivery.
solutions.paraphCard6: Your personal and medical information remains protected.

contact.paraph: Leave us a message if you have any questions regarding the Ekose RX app, an agent will get in touch with you shortly.

securite.texte: Your data and exchanges are protected by advanced security protocols and comply with medical confidentiality.

faq.reponse1: You book an appointment, exchange securely with the professional, then receive your prescription if needed.
faq.reponse2: Yes, all your information is encrypted and strictly confidential.
faq.reponse3: Yes, the doctor can issue an electronic prescription after the consultation.
